name: Toast!
storyline: Journey through different worlds as Fred, a charismatic piece of bread who's goal in life is to not become toast. In this side-scrolling adventure you will battle against numerous foods and enemies alike as they try to turn you into toast. You can attempt to beat every high score in 8 dynamic levels, enjoy beautiful, elegant, and simplistic graphics, and even brag to your friends about your mad "Toast!" skills! Toast has several features including:
summary: Toast offers a casual yet exciting adventure and arcade experience. Players will play as "Fred the bread" as they journey through multiple worlds trying to avoid other foods for risk of becoming toast. The main goal of toast is to create a family friendly yet exciting game for people of all ages.
